value:
$WmMPID_フィレイン,ch04_51_Philein_F_Normal,Face|I have given the range a full pass on
my pegasus. There appear to be no
more bandits in these mountains.$k$p$WmMPID_グレゴ,ch04_50_Grego_M_Normal,Face|Job is complete, then. Yes?$k$p$WmMPID_リヒト,ch04_49_Richt_M_Normal,Face|Sounds like it. I believe we can call
our first mission in Askr a success!$k$p$WmMPID_ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Normal,Face|No injuries were sustained during the
course of this operation. I suppose
that is fortuitous...$k$p$WmMPID_フィレイン,ch04_51_Philein_F_Normal,Face|Your tactics were sound, Robin. It is
thanks to your counsel that it all
went so smoothly.$k$p$WmMPID_グレゴ,ch04_50_Grego_M_Normal,Face|Is time to head back, I am thinking.
Return to castle with much triumph
and swagger!$k$p$WmMPID_リヒト,ch04_49_Richt_M_Normal,Face|I'm just glad we've been able to
prove ourselves useful to our
new hosts.$k$p$WmMPID_グレゴ,ch04_50_Grego_M_Normal,Face|They give us big-hero welcome.
Is only right we help in return.$k$p$WmMPID_フィレイン,ch04_51_Philein_F_Normal,Face|Indeed. The people of Askr have put
their faith in us. We must honor that.$k$p$WmMPID_ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Normal,Face|Our destiny is unaltered.$k$pWhether in Askr or Ylisse...our task
and our fate remain the same. You
would do well to remember that.$k$p$WmMPID_グレゴ,ch04_50_Grego_M_Normal,Face|Well, work is done, time for play.
Gregor will visit shops near castle,
look for beauties there.$k$p$WmMPID_フィレイン,ch04_51_Philein_F_Normal,Face|For your sake, I will pretend I did not
hear that.$k$p$WmMPID_グレゴ,ch04_50_Grego_M_Normal,Face|Maybe Gregor is...ahead of self.
Maybe we rest first, yes?$k$p$WmMPID_ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Normal,Face|If we must. Prepare the camp. I will
draw up the watch rotation.$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_リヒト,ch04_49_Richt_M_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|Ugh...can't sleep for some reason.
Maybe a walk around the camp will
clear my head.$k$pWait, wasn't Robin supposed to be
keeping watch? Where's she gone
off to?$k$pGah! What's that light?! It's blinding!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_盗賊頭,ch10_37_Thiefhead_M_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|I keep tellin' you, I've got nothin' to
do with this lot! My crew's not
even here!$k$pYou're messin' with the wrong guy.
I didn't do nothin'. Get outta my face!
Leave me be!$k$p$WmMPID_魔器ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Weapon01,Face|Your identity, objective, and past
actions are irrelevant to me.$k$pYour sole purpose is to be destroyed,
that I might assess the extent of
my power.$k$pYou are a test subject. A target.$k$p$WmMPID_盗賊頭,ch10_37_Thiefhead_M_Normal,Face|What's that supposed to—agh! Feels
like I'm...bein' crushed alive...$k$p$WmMPID_リヒト,ch04_49_Richt_M_Normal,Face|Robin? Why do you look different
now? More importantly, what are
you doing?!$k$p$WmMPID_魔器ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Weapon01,Face|I see we have an uninvited guest.$k$p$WmMPID_リヒト,ch04_49_Richt_M_Normal,Face|I've never seen that kind of power
before... What's going on here?$k$p$WmMPID_魔器ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Weapon01,Face|I had intended to remain concealed
until I had gained full control over
this vessel.$k$pI suppose I can still manage that. All I
need to do is ensure neither of you
leaves this place alive.$k$p$WmMPID_リヒト,ch04_49_Richt_M_Normal,Face|What are you—ngh! Robin, stop!
You're hurting me!$k$p$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|Enough.$k$p$WmMPID_魔器ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Weapon01,Face|More interruptions? The gall.$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|I sense an arcane weapon behind
that sinister power of yours.$k$p$WmMPID_魔器ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Weapon01,Face|Worms, all of you...$k$p$WmMPID_グレゴ,ch04_50_Grego_M_Normal,Face|Ricken! You OK?$k$p$WmMPID_フィレイン,ch04_51_Philein_F_Normal,Face|What has become of Robin? I hardly
recognize her...$k$p$WmMPID_魔器ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Weapon01,Face|They swarm in, like moths to a flame.
No matter. It changes nothing.$k$pDisrupting me has sealed your fate.
I shall relish dispensing death to
each of you....in due time.$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|If you think I will let such a promising
lead escape me—$k$p$WmMPID_リヒト,ch04_49_Richt_M_Normal,Face|Whoa! She disappeared into thin air!$k$p$WmMPID_盗賊頭,ch10_37_Thiefhead_M_Normal,Face|Thanks for the save, folks. Do me a
solid and keep her busy while I leg it,
yeah? Ugh, this blasted kingdom...$k$p
